name: Rasmalai Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Rasmalai Recipe: Dry Milk 2 cups Fresh Milk 1 kg Khoya 250 g Eggs 2 Sugar 1 cup Cardamom Powder 1 tsp Baking Powder 1 tsp Flour 2 tbsp Oil 2 tbsp Kewra Essence few drops Almonds, Pistachios Â½ cup
instructions: Boil milk and sugar in a pan When sugar dissolves, add khoa and a few drops of kewra essence Cook well In a mixing bowl add dry milk, oil, flour, cardamom powder and baking powder Mix well Whip the egg and gradually add it to the dry milk mixture Knead into a dough Shape the dough into small balls and add them in boiled milk When the balls are ready, remove from the milk Garnish with almonds and serve
